New Records: Mike Yastrzemski hit a game-winning home run in the seventh inning, breaking the tie and securing the Giants' 5-4 victory over the Brewers.
Key Match Events: Mike Yastrzemski's two-run home run in the seventh inning was the turning point of the game.
Pre-Game Insights: The Giants entered the game needing a win to stay alive in the National League Wild Card chase.
Post-Match Reflections: The win moved the Giants to 67-66 on the season, keeping them in contention for a playoff spot.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the start of a three-game series between the Giants and the Brewers.
